import "./App.css"; import { Link, Route, Routes } from "react-router-dom"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { getAll } from "./BooksAPI"; function MainPage() { const [allShelfBook, setAllShelfBook] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const dogetAllShelfBooks = async () =>{ const res = await getAll(); setAllShelfBook(res); }; dogetAllShelfBooks(); }, []) const handleChange = (event,book,shelf) => { console.log(event.target.value); console.log(book); console.log(shelf); } return (

MyReads

Currently Reading

    {allShelfBook.filter((bookShelf) => bookShelf.shelf === 'currentlyReading').map((book) =>
  1. {book.title}
    {book.authors}
    2. )}

Want to Read

    {allShelfBook.filter((bookShelf) => bookShelf.shelf === 'wantToRead').map((book) =>
  1. {book.title}
    {book.authors}
    2. )}

Read

    {allShelfBook.filter((bookShelf) => bookShelf.shelf === 'read').map((book) =>
  1. {book.title}
    {book.authors}
    2. )}
Add a book
); } export default MainPage;
